question: At which of the following places, INC decided to collect one crore ruppes as Tilak Swarj fund?
explanation:
All India congress committee met at Vijayawada on 31st March and 1st April 1921.
  • During this meeting INC decided to collect one crore ruppes as Tilak Swarj fund.
  • At this meeting only, Pingali Venkaiah designed tri-color flag for congress.
